"Did Jim tell you what Mom said?" Tom asks without missing a single beat on his endless attack. Harmony jumps, she was sure that she hadn't been heard entering. 'When did he notice me?'

"Yea, if I manage to eat one of you I'll have the day off from school." Probably so that she can digest in peace, something that Harmony's mother, Melody, considered important. "Want to do the usual thing?"

This refers to a habit that Harmony and her brothers had gotten into to break the monotony of her attempts to swallow one of them. They would compete with Harmony in some physical activity or game to determine whether they'd act as "willing" or as "unwilling" prey for their sister. Classically it was the winner's decision, but Harmony almost always wanted to try unwilling and the brothers almost always wanted to act as willing. Some people might think that this kind of contest is inherently unfair, as Harmony has a predator's strength yet, but they'd be somewhat wrong. While Harmony gained a portion of the predatory strength when she first unhinged her jaw at age 13, her strength is far below that of a full predator. Harmony and her brothers agree that it's probably because she hasn't actually had any prey yet, but she's only somewhat stronger then most of them. In point of fact, Tom is one of only a few of her brothers who actually can beat her at any physical challenge... though it greatly depends on what the game is. Far stronger then she looks, but also far short of a predator's strength.

Tom finishes his session with the training dummy with a few solid hits before he responds, "Sure." The huge man walks over to a lottery machine looking device on the wall. There's a few of these on every floor, designed to randomize the competition so that nobody could complain about the selection being unfair. Harmony follows her brother in time to see him pull the lever and the spinning stop of arm wrestling... one of the worst games she could play against Tom. But maybe she can beat him now that he's tired from his work out?
1253112112111.title: Going Downstairs

12531121121111.content:
Wondering how she'd best use this contest of pure strength to her advantage, Harmony sets her elbow on the bench they decided to use as a platform to play on. 'Maybe I can get him the instant it starts, going full force to catch him off guard?' Tom set himself down across from his much smaller sister, the difference in their builds absurd. Tom is nearly two foot taller then little Harmony, and close to twice as broad, almost making it look like a child playing against an adult. But Tom knows better then to underestimate a female's strength, part of why he has always taken improving his own inadequate strength so seriously.

The pair of combatants grip each other's hands, ready for the game to begin. "On 3. 1, 2, 3!" Harmony counts down, starting before she even finishes saying three. Tom is not completely unprepared and manages to keep from hitting the bench, but is pressed back by the ambush. He holds firm, arm shaking from the effort, and lets Harmony uselessly press against his now solidified position. Banking on his exhaustion and the difficulty of keeping his arm in position at halfway down, Harmony does exactly as Tom expects and pushes without any tricks.

Tom has tilted his wrist to absorb her thoughtless press, allowing him to hang on with half the effort that she is exerting, and watches while the struggle goes on for a minute. Then 2, 3 all the way until 5 minutes and Harmony is panting with effort, now covered in sweat herself while Tom has preserved most of his strength. Tom returns his wrist to its original position and explodes forward with all his strength pinning Harmony's tiny hand under his own huge paw.

"I win Harmony," Tom says with a smile. "You have to start using your strength better. You could have had me easily if you used your head as well as your brawn." Coming from most of her brothers Harmony would have felt insulted, but from Tom she couldn't think of anything to say in defense of her actions. "That said, the surprise attack was pretty smart. Dirty, but smart." Harmony grins at the praise, and cracks her neck as she prepares for the actual attempt to eat Tom. "So, I think we'll give you a bit of a reward and play unwilling like you always ask for." Tom says as he hugs his sister's head to his chest.

Harmony blinks, "wait, what?" Then gets kneed in the face as Tom springs into action. The huge man completely ignores her as she lays flat on her back from the unexpected blow, running past her to the door. Harmony recovers quickly and rolls over reaching out to try to grab his foot as she stands. Sadly, Tom is quicker and dodges the grab by the skin of his teeth, pulling open the door as he flees.

Enraged, Harmony blasts up to her feet as she charges forward, throwing the still closing door out of her way hard enough to crack the wooden door when it slams against the wall and swings back closed behind her. For all his strength and endurance, Tom has never been able to teach his body to run long distances at good speed, his weight making acceleration difficult and his size making wind resistance leech his strength away. Plus he corners about as well as a freighter. Harmony has always been fast. Her favorite game to see come up on their lottery is the race, simply because she can beat all of her brothers in that every time. Her small frame and great strength allow her near instant acceleration and tremendous control, letting her corner on a dime without losing any speed at all.

Given this difference, Harmony expected to catch up to Tom in no time. But a chase and a race play by different rules, and Tom is accustomed to being chased by full preds that are faster and stronger then Harmony, while Harmony has only ever raced before. Almost caught up with Tom in the hall, Harmony speeds up even more when he begins to turn, realizing to late that he's opening a door between them that will cut of her path. WHAM! For the second time in a matter of seconds Harmony finds herself on her back with Tom running away from her. Forcing herself to calm down Harmony resumes the chase.

Tom pushes himself hard, feeling his breath come in ragged bursts as he struggles to make his way to his room on the third floor with Harmony dogging his heels. He's used a number of tricks and surprises to slow her down, but it's cost him time as well, and he's slower to start back up after stopping then she is. Still, all he needs is to make it to his room and he can use his gun to end this attempt, teaching his precious sister a lesson about the dangers of underestimating an opponent. He's already on the second floor, but she's too close behind him. It looks like he'll have to make a stand here, at least long enough to make a chance to break away. Looking carefully as he runs he sees the door to Mike's room cracked open, a big 30 by 30 space that doubles as a sparing room. There should even be some mock weapons he can use!

Harmony slows to watch carefully as Tom diverts his course again, wary of another trap. Her breathing is heavy, but even, and she stands in the open doorway, looking in at a huge room containing a few racks of varied wooden mock weapons, a fighting mat designed to prevent serious injury if you were to be knocked on it, as well as a section in one corner that looked like it was someone's bedroom. Her prey stands in the midst of this room holding a carved wooden great sword, the oak blade probably five feet long. His breathing is heavier then her own, but the tip of the blade does not shake as he stands prepared for her, seemingly content to recover while she armed herself with one of the replicas.

Turning back around holding a long sword with a blade around 3 and a half foot she feels it smashed out of her hands as Tom strikes like a serpent. Harmony ducks his backhanded return sweep as he deftly controls the sword that most would need both hands to hold properly. Snarling at the inconvenient resistance, Harmony dives through his reach, only to be knocked back by a savage kick to her abdomen, followed up by an overhead struck with the blade. She rolls to the side out of the way, picking up the long sword as she does, and tricks while standing in one fluid motion. The giant's blade blocks the strike, but is knocked to the side by the force of the blow. Her small size and more agile blade allow her to take the tiny opening, slashing across his chest hard enough that Harmony feels bone crack and Tom's face clouds in pain. But the return blow hits Harmony clear across her head, sending the small woman literally head over heels as the room swims in her vision.

By the time Harmony recovers Tom has left the room, and she sees him turn the corner when she looks out the door of the dojo, heading towards the stairs. Pausing for a moment to think, Harmony realizes that he's heading to his room, and smiles as she heads up the other way, taking the carved long sword with her. When Tom arrives she's already there, and bashes him over the head the moment he enters... or that was the plan at least. Harmony underestimated his height and struck his shoulder instead, shoving the big man back out the door as she struck at him repeatedly, beating him into submission. Caught off guard and hit with such overwhelming strength and fury Tom can do nothing more then protect his vitals as he is utterly unprepared for the assault.

Finally, rage dispersed, Harmony tosses the long sword over her shoulder and roughly grabs Tom by the throat, hauling the half conscious man to his feet as she shows him the gun he'd planned on using to stop her and throws it down the stairs before dragging him into the room. Sitting herself down on his bed she pulls his hands towards her mouth and shoves them into her mouth, which clicks open to accept the large size of the bear paws Tom called hands. The taste, as always, was wonderful... perhaps even better then usual this time though. Harmony felt a deep sense of accomplishment and predatory hunger from having forcefully cornered such a prize, and began to devour her brother's hands, easily swallowing down his forearms as she enjoyed the taste of his sweat. As she crossed his elbows she started to struggle for each swallow, taking in the crown of Tom's head together with both of his thick biceps stretching her further then ever before, even as a huge pain mounts in her jaw, just past where it unlocked the first time.

Is she able to get the second phase to unlock, letting her devour her hard won feast? Or is the pain to great for her to fight through without aid to force it past the final limit?
12531121121111.title: A Mighty Man And A Powerful Predator

choices: To make Harmony quit their school
125311211211111.content:
Swallow.As Harmony struggles to continue her cheeks bulge with the huge mass of the powerful man's mighty muscles, painfully filling them even as the back of her jaw mounts with an ever higher pain. Swallow. She pulls his head far enough into her mouth that she can run her tongue along Tom's forehead, and the pain in the back of her jaw intensifies, as bad as it had been when she unlocked it the first time, and tears begin to flow from her eyes. Swallow. Another inch of her prey's flesh enters her mouth, her cheeks beginning to feel like they may be ripped apart and a new center of pain appearing at the tip of her chin. Swallow. The pain is all she can feel, not even the taste or the satisfaction able to override the threefold centers of hurt demanding her attention. Swallow. The world turns red before her eyes as she sees stars through the pain and finally submits to it, coughing up her brother.

Gagging and hacking, the process of removing Tom from her mouth was far faster and easier then trying to swallow him had been. It had taken almost a minute to swallow him as deeply as she had, but in under 10 seconds her airway was clear and she was coughing a storm, even dry heaving in a desperate attempt to void her stomach as she reeled from the horrible pain. By the time she regains herself, Tom is clearly unconscious, looking like he'll remain that way for a while, and she is already pushing the limit for making it to school on time. So, unable to straighten her self or apply makeup to cover the bruises that Tom's desperate struggles had given her, the youngest McAshith prepares herself for what will doubtless be another trip to hell at school.

Heading to the family's third garage, Harmony picks out the most inconspicuous of her 5 cars, a yellow 4 door Buick. When picking out her cars, her and Melody really had not been thinking much about an ability to hide, and had picked most of them out for how nice they were, how good they looked, how well they ran... but if anything they'd focused on cars that grabbed their eyes to start with. As the 3 pink cars of various luxury models would indicate. Driving to the school Harmony rode like a maniac, as the absolute worst thing would be to arrive late and have to be grilled by the eternally strict Ms. Warner in front of all the other girls.

On a separate note, school for most boys now ends at age 13, which makes sense considering that society, the preds that is, as a whole looks at men as only good for three things. Sex, slave labor and food. At least, that's the official order of importance taught in school. In reality it's closer to food, sex and slave labor... but that just makes it even more understood that teaching most boys is a complete waste of time. Granted, there are geniuses, like Jim, who receive further schooling, one on one with a tutor/teacher, so that they can provide super cheap labor for jobs like computer engineering. Of course, basically nobody tries that route for a very simple reason. Get a "B" on any test in any class during this tutoring phase and the tutor is allowed to eat him. Get a "C" and she is required to eat him. And even after entering the workforce, one mistake and these men can be lunch. It does provide protection until they make a mistake, or it's supposed to at least, but nobody is perfect and very few want to make the attempt.

As a result, from middle school on the schools are only all girl schools. At Harmony's school, Aphrodite High, was the most prestigious school for at least a hundred miles, known for having turned out several of the most famous preds in the world. Where most schools would focus themselves on the classical arts, the things taught before Vore became known, Aphrodite High only went over an absolute minimum of such teaching, focusing itself on the art and science of Vore and building the perfect predator. It showed too. The students here on average had eaten over twice as many boys as other girls their age, and many had already given birth to their second or even third batch of boys... which the school would raise until they graduated. It also showed in a way that Harmony was far more self conscious about. Tits and butts.

Prior to Vore, women of between the size of Harmony and Michele, the next smallest girl at Aphrodite, were common place. In fact, it may be best to say that the majority fell between the two, though there were certainly those bigger then Michele at DD~H cups and asses that grew out about as big. Granted, each single measurement up got significantly rarer, but they were known even back in those days. But after the complete takeover of Vore, for most high school girls "small" is C~DD cup, "average" is F~H and "large" is I and above, with the bottom half keeping up so that there are still the same spread of shapes in roughly the same amounts. Just significantly bigger. Of course, for college girls and older they keep growing, but that's only expected when they keep eating men.

That's at an average high school though. At Aphrodite High, with it's focus on Vore itself... well, they are most often bigger then that. "Small" boobs are more like D~G cup, "average" closer to the H~J cup range and to qualify as "large" would require a chest that is a K cup at the least. 'Oh the difference a proper diet makes.' Harmony sourly thinks to herself as she arrives before the bell rings and has to once again be surrounded by such beauties while looking so slim she could be mistaken for a boy. It honestly was humiliating enough, even before the bullies started... speaking of which here comes Rachel and her crew now. 'Just perfect. The bitch squad. That is just exactly what I needed.' Harmony sarcastically thought as she watched the incoming trio.

This particular threesome are the pride of the school, having won first, second and third prize at last year's cross school Vore contest. Rachel got first, the bottomless pit having swallowed 8 men, totaling 1543 pounds of male flesh, at the contest and is the leader of the pack. She's got a vindictive streak about a mile wide and has had it in for Harmony ever since they quit being friends after Rachel ate her first man. She's also the biggest current student up top by a good margin, at O cup, which makes her bigger then some of the teachers. Overall, she's the class celebrity and bully rolled into one.

Bell, the second prize winner, the beast having devoured 5 men for a total of 1404 pounds and does most of the talking, though nowadays she always defers to Rachel. The bitch has a overactive and cruel imagination, and has forced several humiliations on the undeserving Harmony. She might be able to be credited with pulling this group together, and had control over it until Rachel proved who had the biggest belly. She's bottom heavy, sporting the best ass on campus... which Harmony always found ironic given what an ass Bell is herself. In total, she's a living nightmare for any target she sets her sights on, man or woman.

The final member of the tyrannical trio is Gloria. The silent follower shocked everyone at the contest when she easily consumed 15 boys and young men to take third place with 1376 pounds packed away in her belly. Nothing seems to stick to her frame though, and she is by far the smallest of the bitch squad, with an hourglass figure of only a J cup with an ass to match. And her assets are not the smallest thing about her. Gloria has the smallest mouth out of the three, the smallest of all the students actually, and with only the second phase of her jaw unlocked she can barely swallow a small man. She silently follows the lead of Bell and Rachel, acting as the muscle whenever needed, but something about her always seemed strange. Harmony has never known just what to make of Gloria, but out of all of them Gloria scares her the most.

What do they want this time?
125311211211111.title: Heading to school empty bellied

choices: Education is important... stay at school.
1253112112111111.content:
Bell, the acting spokeswoman, came close to Harmony... a delighted grin on her beautiful face. Harmony had never seen such an evil look on her. And when Gloria spat at her and Bell gave voice to their opinions, Harmony knew why.

"Well, doesn't this young man look tasty~" the bully purred. "What does he think he's doing at an all girl school? Does he want to be lunch?" She giggled to the other two. Rachel just stayed back a step, the queen enjoying watching the show while Gloria took more direct action. Gloria picked her up and shoved Harmony's head into her mouth, running her tongue along the much smaller girl before spitting her out. The other two laugh as Harmony hits the ground.

Harmony stands slowly, her pride and body both aching. She knows better than to try fighting these three. And as slim as her figure is she really might be swallowed for real! She clamped down on that thought, hiding her fear as she just looked back at the trio. "I am not a Boy." She told them stiffly.

They all howled with laughter. Rachel spoke up this time. "Listen here Runt. If you don't prove it and eat a guy soon... well, there's only one spot you'll be able to stay at this school." She patted her massive tits and rubbed her growling belly. Making that place very obvious. "So either leave, or eat someone quickly little boy. I'm hungry."

Mercifully they left after that, but Harmony was absolutely late for Mrs. Warner's class now. Will she take a skip and try to hunt someone who will fit in her belly? Or does she continue going through her school day?
1253112112111111.title: To make Harmony quit their school

12531121121111112.content:
Harmony sighs, rushing to Mrs. Warner’s class. It simply wasn’t worth embarrassing herself trying to hunt just because Rachel and her goons were a bunch of threatening bitches. True, this was a step up from the normal bullying they did, but those three knew exactly what would happen if they followed through. Harmony’s mother, Melody, would enact her rights as an Executioner to eliminate those found guilty of eating a woman.

After all, it wasn’t as if predators were incapable of eating each other. Just that it was so difficult as to be practically impossible. They had roughly equal fitness and the sheer size of a predator’s prey fattened body was extremely close to the limits of how big most predators could open their mouths. Take Gloria for an example.

The slimmest of the three bullies was big for a high school girl, but from college age on her J cup 46” bust was fairly normal. Past a certain point the even became below average by a noticeable amount. But the average predator would have to open to her limits to force the fatty tissue of the mammaries down. And that possibility could be made impossible simply by crossing one’s arms in front of that chest. A good enough predator with a large enough mouth would manage anyways, some with ease even, but the difficulty only got bigger with each size larger the would be prey was. With her O cup bust line of some 53 inches, Rachel was close to impossible to swallow if she just crossed her arms in front of her tits!

Some idiots still tried it of course, but unlike men... women had rights! And defending those rights by punishing those killers who ate their own kind was the duty of an Executioner. It was something they studied in class even. Not that anyone, especially Harmony, would accuse Rachel, Bell or Gloria of actually paying attention.

When Harmony got to class, Mrs. Warner frowns. “So good of you to join us. You are just in time to help with a demonstration.”

Harmony swallows nervously. Mrs. Warner was an Executioner who was teaching Predation Theory and Practice. A rather dangerous class to be asked to take part in a demonstration for, as a punishment at least, since the demonstrations often ended with one person getting churned into fat. And as an Executioner, Mrs. Warnef could easily authorize a student to digest Harmony. “What kind of demonstration?”

“One that you are perfectly suited for since your jaw has only managed the first level unlock and you have yet to consume any prey.” Mrs Warner answers without clarification. Then glances over the class. “Michelle. You’ll be Harmony’s partner for the demonstration.”

Once Michelle, the smallest girl at Aphrodite High after Harmony herself, had gotten to the front along with Mrs. Warner and Harmony the teacher gave both girls the same instruction. “Strip.”

Harmony blushed while Michelle smiled. Only when beside Harmony did she get to look big and beautiful, so she gladly followed the instruction. By the time Harmony had taken off her socks and shoes Michelle was in just her underwear. “Take off everything.” Mrs. Warner instructs when Michelle looked to the teacher.

A short time later both girls were fully naked in front of their classmates. Mrs. Warner asks them both how many prey they’ve eaten and what their sizes were.

Michelle answered first, smiling proudly. “So far I’ve added 7 guys to my body. I haven’t measured myself since the last guy though, but I can tell you he made all my perfectly fitting clothes real tight!”

The class laughs, amused by the statement. True, Michelle hasn’t had that many prey yet, but she had the right spirit about it. Mrs. Warner nods. “We’ll measure you in a minute then. Harmony?”

A groan escapes Harmony’s lips as she answers. “I’ve yet to snag a single prey. I’m 5’1 and my 3 measurements are 24”, 22”, 26”... I’m still using a training bra.”

The class nearly dies laughing. What the hell kind of measurements were these!? A 10 year old’s? Mrs. Warner eventually quiets them. “This kind of grow can only be expected when a girl has unlocked the first level of her jaw, but not the second. Especially when she has yet to eat any prey.” She begins explaining the difference ins strength unlocked with each new level to which the jaw has been opened and how there is a direct connection to how strong a predator is and how fast they burn through their food while measuring Michelle.

“Alright. Michelle is 5’9 and her three measurements are 43”, 33”, 46” and her bust is a G cup. It probably took some of you dozens of prey to get that kind of measurement, but Michelle is a weak predator who can only target slender boys unless she manages to unlock the 3rd level of her jaw. For now it means she can easily gain weight, but it also means more prey can escape her.” Mrs. Warner explains.

Then Mrs. Warner stands behind Harmony. “Harmony on the other hand is a polar opposite. For a girl who has yet to unlock the 2nd level of her jaw she has phenomenal strength and would easily burn off a young kid without gaining an ounce. If she does manage to unlock her jaw to the second level I recommend all of you watch yourselves. She would be able to compare herself to Executioners, and some might say that she was one in all but name.”

The class went dead silent at that. Every last one of them had ruthlessly bullied Harmony for at least a year. Several of them for much longer. “As for today’s demonstration. We will show these girl’s current strength, the difficulty of unlocking each level of the jaw and hopefully show the increase in strength if someone does pull off the unlocking. In the process we’ll end up losing one of them I’m sure, but that will allow me to demonstrate tomorrow the massive amount of difference in 100 or 150 pounds of male flesh as compared to the same weight of female meat.”

“So, after we check a few things to measure your current strength, who wants to try to eat the other first?” Mrs. Warner asks, smiling.
12531121121111112.title: Just make it through the day

choices: Give me another choice of dragoness
125331.content:
Sarah is a twenty one year old dragoness, and she has become quite a pro at vore. She is huge in both height and weight, and is always on the prowl for prospective meals.

Maya is a fifteen year old dragoness, and her birthday is coming up, meaning that is time for her first vore meal. Tall, slender, and busty for her age, she has been eagerly anticipating this special birthday present.
125331.title: Who are you?

13.title: Both of them?

info.brief_description: In a world where one gender can vore the other, will you be the pred or the prey?
info.description:
50 years ago, there was a revolution. For unknown reasons, one gender gained the ability to eat and digest the other. At first it was considered murder. But now due to overpopulation, and laws put in place, it is simply accepted as a part of life.
People will eat others for nutrition, but mainly to help them improve their bodies. Cheerleaders will gulp down their boyfriends to get that nice plump rack, or maybe a guy will vore a girl to make a nice load of cum.

50 years from then, vore is a natural part of life. Are you a predator or a prey? Do you have what it takes to survive?

You can choose which gender is the predators, and you can choose who to play as.

RULES: No hard vore, only soft
-All vore is fatal, no endo or reforming
